data.title: Allies Are Forever (Until They Are No More): Yugoslavia’s Multivectoral Foreign Policy During Titoism
data.meta_description: Yugoslavia’s political development after the Second World War was largely shaped by Josip Broz Tito, the founder of the Socialist Federal Republic of Yugoslavia (SFRY), her Prime Minister (1943–1963) and President (1953–1980) as well as General...
